TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SharedPropertyGroup extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a collection of shared properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享属性组由包含管理器同步。The shared property group is synchronized by the containing manager. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类创建 SharedPropertyGroup。The following code example shows how to use the class to create a SharedPropertyGroup.
